Text:
Many thanks, this is one hell of a great series.

Still I'd like to ask you to post season 2. Season 3's links are working but season two has half the links down  :( this is nearly impossible to get in my country.

Again thank you
Maybe in future. Now I don't have time to work on that and also no HDD space...

Many thanks for the possibility. We are still leeching so only after we seed for sometime.

If you happen to know of new/different links for this second season...
